feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 3:57 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -24.4°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -28.3°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
